name: AtomiCat
description:
Staff:

Code + Graphics: Ariel Endaraues

Additional Coding: GreenWeb Sevilla

Music: Trevin Hughes

KEYS:

O - Left

P - Right

SPACE - Jump

A game made with the MK1 engine of the Mojon Twins, for the MK1 contest with Retromaniac

Plot:

When radiation spread through town and mutants invaded the streets, Maggie and her faithful feline Alphonse were among the few who managed to survive. Now, momentarily safe inside a bunker, Alphonse must go to the surface and find the transmitter located on the other side of the city to get help. 

Good luck!
